descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/SweetRoll_zps72605e63.png[/img]   



[center][/center]




[color=#e69138]
[/color][center][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][b][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9193/?]Now available for Skyrim Special Edition[/url]

Sweet Rolls, Mead, Pies, Red Meat.... yeah, the average Nord's diet doesn't exactly match up with his physic. [/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i][/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i]
[youtube]8UQNIhDI-f8[/youtube]
Thanks to Shinji72 for video.


This mod will add several Fat NPCs to Skyrim.  Some are existing NPCs, others are new. Bandit and Forsworn camps now feature Fat NPCs as well.  All feature a new "Fat Bastard" body mesh, and clothes/armors that have been converted to fit. Each new NPC has been placed by hand, meaning no level list have been altered.  [/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i][/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i]
[img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/200px-Black-BriarMead_zps92476bb1.png[/img]
Existing NPCs have only had their apperances altered, nothing more. This mod does not affect your PC in any way, your installed meshes/textures will remain untouched. Since NPCs were outfitted/placed by hand, no elders/children will appear as fat, also  this prevents entire camps of fat bandits/forsworn. [/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i][/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][i]


[font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5]The converted clothes/armors are marked as playable, so they can be worn by your PC, however they are not intended to be, so you may noticed issues. So far about 20 NPCs are included in the mod,  I will update it to add more.[/size][/color][/font]


[b][size=3][i][u]Also, if you enjoy this mod mod please endorse, it's the only I know  if I should continue to support a mod[/u][/i][/size][/b][/i][/b][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][i][u] [/u][/i][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][color=#e69138][size=5][u][i][/i][/u][/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][center][b][font=Palatino Linotype][size=5][i][color=#e69138]
[img]http://i24.photobucket.com/albums/c18/lfostelr/Apple_Pie_zps78cfb06b.png[/img]

Please leave any feedback/questions in the comments section.

Some other mods you may enjoy:
[/color][/i][/size][/font][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51118/?]
